`6Growtopia`` `3line 1`` `5line 2 `7line 3```` Cancel Ok Descr str You've got `2Grow-Mail``! Join the fun with your fellow Growtopians!
`oThe `2Mailbox`` has arrived! Sealed with fun, stamped with surprises, and always first-class!
Hey there, Growtopian! Introducing the brand-new `2Mailbox``, your all-in-one hub for `wofficial messages`` and `8surprise rewards`` from the `6Growtopia Team``!
Whether it's a nifty `5gift``, a `4system update``, or a little something just because - it'll all be delivered straight to your `2Mailbox``! No more missed messages, no more reward rush! Each message or reward comes with an expiry timer, so you can grab them when you feel ready (just make sure you've got some inventory space before claiming, nobody likes a packed pocket!).
And don't worry, this box is strictly business (no Growtopian fan mails just yet).
So what are you waiting for? Pop open your `2Mailbox`` and see what's inside! Who knows what surprises are envelope-ing you!?
Signed, Sealed, Delivered - it's all yours!
~ `6The Growtopia Team```

Pick which {} item you want your Growtopian to wear.
Sell your items through auction. Once the auction starts you will not be able to cancel the auction. When the auction ends, whatever the final bid ends up being will be the sale price so choose your starting bid carefully.
You need to fill all the above sections before you can begin this auction. That item can't be sold at auction! Please try another item. Only the owner can setup the auction. Buy items through this auction block.
Place your bids but remember, the final bid when the auction ends will be the sale price so choose your bid carefully. Once placed you can't withdraw your bid until the auction ends.

Hey Growtopian,
`8HarvestFest`` is here—jump in today to harvest trees under the moonlight, gather Mooncakes & Songpyeons, and craft them into festive treasures! It's the season to celebrate together and enjoy one of Growtopia's most cherished traditions. This year, don't miss the exclusive Gromoji's Little Partner—only during HarvestFest! Need an extra boost? Use Mooncake Magnificence to increase your Mooncake drops! Or create your very own harvest world with Harvest Blast, filled with 99 random trees and even rare Cherry Blossoms for Purity Mooncakes!
`2We've prepared a little gift to kick things off—enjoy the Harvest moon and start celebrating today! ``
Growtopia Team A Gift Awaits You This HarvestFest Jump in now, harvest trees, and discover new surprises—only during this year's festival!
Dear Growtopian,
As the curtains close on `5Growtopia Fashion Weekend``, we celebrate you - the star who brought flair and imagination to the runway.
To honor your unique style, we're delighted to present the `2Glamorous Crown``. `1Perfect for a Mr. Growtopia or Miss Growtopia``, it's a sparkling reminder that fashion is more than looks - `eit's how you Express in Style``.
Stay Stylish, The Growtopia Team A Crown for a Star Your Glamorous Crown Awaits - Express in Style
Hi Growtopians,
Haven't joined `5Wonder Week`` yet? Now's your chance! We're giving you`2 5 FREE Wonder Providers``, so you can dive right in.
Every day this week, a new Store item awaits, tied to fun Growtopia activities. And for even rarer finds, the Chest of Wonders guarantees 1 wonder from past years.
Use your free `2Wonder Providers`` - explore Wonder Week today!
Growtopia Team Discover Wonder Week with Free Gifts! 5 Wonder Providers inside - claim now!
Hi Growtopians,
We loved spending time with you! Enjoy your reward and see you soon!
Growtopia Team Thanks for Joining Growtopia Live! Rewards inside
Hi Growtopians,
The Dungeons have changed-new boss, new powers, new dangers! Use the exclusive code `4DNMAGIC25`` to claim 70 Scrolls, power up your strength, and confront the mysterious `qMagic Crystal Ball Boss``! Sharpen your skills and conquer the challenge before it's too late!
The Growtopia Team A New Dungeon Challenge Awaits! Code inside! Take your 70 Scrolls and dive in!
Hi Growtopians,
The Dark King calls once more! Venture into the `8Tomb of Growganoth``, brave vanishing platforms, and make your offerings to the `8Maw`` for haunting treasures. Use your `2Dark Tickets, Sigils``, and `2Dark King's Offerings`` to begin your ritual-and don't forget your `2Fashion Show Tickets`` to celebrate in spooky style. The shadows won't wait forever!
The Growtopia Team The Dark King Awaits Your Tribute! Claim gifts and face Growganoth's wrath!

Hi Growtopians,
The worlds are filling with Turkeys and rewards - come join the fun! Ring your Bell, gather Turkeys, and take on Sgt. Stuffins for exclusive treasures. Redeem code `2THXGIVING25GT-A`` to pick up your free Organic Turkey, Turkey Sucker, and Thanksgiving Bell. Jump in and celebrate the season with everyone!
The Growtopia Team Thanksgiving Gift code Inside! Grab your gifts and join the hunt!
